role_selection.title: Choose Your Role
body: Many people played a role in rolling out ChatGPT across the CSU. Pick which role you will take on.

options.label: Be a System-Wide CIO
options.description: Sets CSU-wide strategy and answers to everyone.

options.label: Be a Campus Engagement Partner
options.description: Knows every campus contact and keeps morale up.

options.label: Be a Chief Infrastructure & Administrative Officer
options.description: Wear all of the hats.

options.label: Be a Senior Technology Strategist
options.description: Walking the wire of new technology adoption.

about_csu.title: Rolling Across the CSU
body: You are coordinating a rollout that touches 23 diverse campuses, from Humboldt to San Diego.
Each location has unique faculty culture, infrastructure readiness, and appetite for AI experimentation.
To succeed you must keep morale high, satisfy governance reviews, and prove value through adoption metrics.
Prepare your team, set the right pace, and brace for the unexpected.
about_csu.prompt: Press ENTER to return to the main menu.

leaderboard.title: System-wide Rollout Leaders
body: The leaderboard tracks legendary AI Trailblazers who reached CSU Maritime with budget and goodwill to spare.
Finish the prototype to see your name etched alongside the greats.
leaderboard.prompt: Press ENTER to return to the main menu.

team_naming.title: Name Your Team
body: What is the name of your rollout team?
team_naming.prompt: Enter names and press Submit to continue.

start_timing.title: Pick Your Rollout Date
body: AI has suddenly become a critical technology. Leadership asks you to pick a rollout date.

options.label: Right now (January)
options.description: The only choice the Chancellor’s Office will approve.

options.label: Wait until summer
options.description: Not an option.

options.label: Kick off in the fall
options.description: No, Press release sent.

options.label: Politely decline
options.description: Hilarious, but No.

start_timing.prompt: When will you begin the rollout?

resource_menu.title: Hire Your New Staff
body: Before starting this large rollout, you should acquire dedicated staff.

options.label: Systems Administrator
options.benefit: Keeps infrastructure steady and outages low.

finishOption.label: Continue with no new FTE
finishOption.description: Roll out using the team you already have.

actions.label: Continue the rollout
actions.description: Advance to the next campus and face new events.

actions.label: Change pace
actions.description: Adjust how aggressively you push deployments.

actions.label: Stop to rest (mental health day)
actions.description: Take a breather to restore morale.

actions.label: Conduct training or hackathon
actions.description: Invest time to boost adoption and goodwill.

actions.label: Talk to stakeholders
actions.description: Hold listening sessions to stabilize support.

actions.label: Request emergency funding
actions.description: Beg the Chancellor’s Office for more money.

change_pace.title: Adjust Rollout Pace
body: Pace affects morale and how quickly you move between campuses.

options.label: Steady
options.description: Balanced push that keeps morale intact.

options.label: Strenuous
options.description: Move fast but risk fraying nerves.

options.label: Grueling
options.description: Burn the midnight oil—at a steep morale cost.

engagement_levels.title: Set Engagement Level
body: Engagement determines adoption speed, goodwill, and burnout.

options.label: Filling
options.description: Workshops, office hours, and full support.

options.label: Meager
options.description: Emails, reminders, and cheat sheets.

options.label: Bare-bones
options.description: Hope, prayer, and a FAQ page.

engagement_levels.prompt: Choose how hands-on your engagement will be.

conditions.label: Lose staff / burnout
conditions.result: You ran out of implementation teams.

conditions.label: Run out of time
conditions.result: The academic year ended before you finished.

victory.title: CSU Maritime Reached!
body: Faculty, students, and staff are using ChatGPT daily.
Your legacy as an AI Trailblazer is secured.
victory.prompt: Press ENTER to see the scoring breakdown.

game_over.title: Rollout Halted
game_over.prompt: Press ENTER to return to the main menu.

reasons.budget: The budget was depleted before the rollout finished.
reasons.morale: Your team burned out and could not continue.
reasons.goodwill: Systemwide goodwill collapsed and the rollout lost support.
reasons.time: The academic year ended before you reached all campuses.

progress_status.prompt: Press ENTER to size up the rollout

quiz_intro.title: Chancellor's Office Briefing
body: Before you depart, the Chancellor's staff wants to make sure you're aligned on rollout priorities.
Choose the strategy that best sets up CSU for a successful ChatGPT deployment.

options.label: Kick off with a statewide communication plan
options.description: Share the vision across all 23 campuses immediately.

options.label: Train campus implementation teams first
options.description: Make sure everyone knows how to support ChatGPT on day one.

options.label: Secure governance approvals before announcements
options.description: Keep policy leaders on-side before the rollout hits the news.
